mapper.select: SELECT u_id, u_nickname, u_phone, u_profileimg_url, u_status, u_loginid, u_email, u_loc, u_updateat, num FROM ( SELECT u_id, u_nickname, u_phone, u_status, u_profileimg_url, u_email, u_loc, u_loginid, u_updateat, rownum as num FROM users ) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT u_id, u_nickname, u_phone, u_profileimg_url, u_gender, u_push_noti, u_email_noti, u_sms_noti, u_role, u_birth, u_status, u_loginid, u_email, u_loc, u_createat, u_updateat FROM users WHERE u_id=#{u_id}

SELECT u_id, u_nickname, u_phone, u_profileimg_url, u_status, u_loginid, u_email, u_loc, u_updateat, num FROM ( SELECT u_id, u_nickname, u_phone, u_status, u_profileimg_url, u_email, u_loc, u_loginid, u_updateat, rownum AS num FROM ( SELECT * FROM users WHERE u_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR u_loginid LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR u_email LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ORDER BY u_updateat DESC ) ) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*) / 10.0) FROM users WHERE u_nickname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR u_loginid LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR u_email LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
